mapper.select: SELECT prr.prs_date, pr.prs_name, pre.prs_err_qty, pre.err_code, er.err_name, er.err_pct, ee.emp_name FROM process pr JOIN process_run prr ON pr.prs_code = prr.prs_code JOIN process_inf pri ON pri.prs_no = prr.prs_no JOIN process_err pre ON pri.prs_pf_no = pre.prs_pf_no JOIN error er ON pre.err_code = er.err_code JOIN employee ee ON ee.emp_id = prr.prs_manager JOIN produce pe ON pe.pre_no = prr.pre_no ORDER BY prr.prs_date DESC
